message:
PHOENIX (AP) -- Arizona is considering making a Colt revolver that was popular in the West in the late 19th century the state's official firearm.

‎"Anti-gun activists want lawmakers to consider bills limiting guns in the wake of a deadly Tucson shooting that killed six & wounded Rep. Gabrielle Giffords. But the Republican-led Legislature has a strong record of supporting gun rights."

http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_ARIZONA_STATE_FIREARM?SITE=AP&SECTION=HOME&TEMPLATE=DEFAULT&CTIME=2011-02-23-11-03-48
